---
title: "Nathanael (Bartholomew)"
---
**The Straight Shooter**

**Strengths:** Honest, perceptive, sincere

**Role in God’s Story:** Nathanael speaks his mind but responds wholeheartedly to truth. He reminds us that God honors integrity and quick recognition of His presence.

**Where he shows up in the Gospels:**

* [John 1:45–51](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+1%3A45-51&version=NIV) – Initially skeptical, but quickly confesses Jesus as the Son of God
